#summary A way to organise automatic storrage for torrents.
#labels Featured
= Introduction =

Torrent Filtering is a way to organise automatic storrage for torrents.

When user add a torrent CuteTorrent will chose type acording to torrent filtering group and offer user save path. Of cource user can change it how he wants.


= Details =

To enable torrent filtering you should add a Torrent Filtering group in program settings.

When adding a torrent filterting group you should add its name, extensions by which torrents will be filtered and save path which will be offered as a save path for torrent.
